alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:31PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Westchester and Putnam Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yorktown Heights, or near Mount Kisco, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Peekskill, Mount Kisco, Mahopac, Lake Carmel, Brewster, Cold Spring, Carmel, Yorktown Heights, Fahnestock State Park, Jefferson Valley, Putnam Valley, Croton-on-Hudson, Buchanan and Brewster Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
